comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEDC2A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEDC2A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type DC2A model. This model represents represent field-controlled dc commutator exciters with continuously acting voltage regulators having supplies obtained from the generator or auxiliary bus.  It differs from the Type DC1A model only in the voltage regulator output limits, which are now proportional to terminal voltage . It is representative of solid-state replacements for various forms of older mechanical and rotating amplifier regul

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efd1
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 3.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd2
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 2.29. Default: 0.0

contents.name: exclim
contents.comment: (exclim).  IEEE standard is ambiguous about lower limit on exciter output. Typical Value = - 999  which means that there is no limit applied. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seefd1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.279. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seefd2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.117. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 1.33. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.675. Default: 0

contents.name: uelin
contents.comment: UEL input (uelin). true = input is connected to the HV gate false = input connects to the error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 4.95. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -4.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
